duties_responsibilities.duty: Align people, processes, and technology to serve the strategy of the organization within the finance department and across other departments.
Understand the needs of data consumers, evaluate potential solutions, and work with Finance IT to implement those solutions.
Serve as a lead resource for acquisition and green field integrations within the finance department.
Assist with ad hoc projects or tasks as needed within the finance department.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in accounting, finance, or other business-related field (Master's preferred)
